data.quote: I enjoy jokes, smiling, and making people smile. I may be a little different, but that's OK, who wants to be normal anyway?

data.quote: I like to smile when its natural. I'm not mad or anything. That's my style.
data.author: Jesse McCartney

data.quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
data.author: Shinichi Suzuki

data.quote: Smile, smile, smile at your mind as often as possible. Your smiling will considerably reduce your mind's tearing tension.
data.author: Sri Chinmoy

data.quote: If the world's a veil of tears, Smile till rainbows span it.
data.author: Lucy Larcom

data.quote: Everyone looks so much better when they smile.
data.author: Jimmy Fallon

data.quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy.
data.author: Serena Williams

data.quote: Wear a smile and have friends wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: Real men laugh at opposition real men smile when enemies appear.
data.author: Marcus Garvey

data.quote: First, I want to pay tribute to Diana myself. She was an exceptional and gifted human being. In good times and bad, she never lost her capacity to smile and laugh, nor to inspire others with her warmth and kindness. I admired and respected her - for her energy and commitment to others, and especially for her devotion to her two boys.
data.author: Queen Elizabeth II

data.quote: Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
data.author: Vanilla Ice

data.quote: Always wear a smile because you never know who is watching.
data.author: Gracie Gold

data.quote: People ask me to smile for the camera, but somehow it always comes out gloomy.
data.author: Stephen Rea

data.quote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
data.author: Jimmy Buffett

data.quote: A smile is so sexy, yet so warm. When someone genuinely smiles at you, it's the greatest feeling in the world.
data.author: Mandy Moore

data.quote: If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
data.author: Andy Rooney

data.quote: My cheeks explode when I smile. That's why I have to look so nonplussed.
data.author: Rufus Wainwright

data.quote: Don't disrespect me, lie about it, and then come smile in my face and act like nothing's wrong.
data.author: Scottie Pippen

data.quote: Even if you're unhappy, just pretend that you're happy. Eventually, your smile will be contagious to yourself. I had to learn that. I used to think, 'I'm being fake,' but you know what? Better to be fake and happy than real and miserable.
data.author: Evangeline Lilly

data.quote: We all have our down days, but it's not hard to smile and say, 'Thank you.'
data.author: Yvette Nicole Brown

data.quote: Sarcasm helps me overcome the harshness of the reality we live, eases the pain of scars and makes people smile.
data.author: Mahmoud Darwish

data.quote: Id rather have a fake smile than a nasty stare.
data.author: Tamara Ecclestone

data.quote: Smile. It instantly lifts the face, and it just lights up the room.
data.author: Christie Brinkley

data.quote: People don't know that when there is something running in my mind, I start smiling. If I'm angry, I smile and blush.
data.author: Hansika Motwani

data.quote: Look back, and smile on perils past.
data.author: Walter Scott

data.quote: Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.
data.author: Andre Maurois

data.quote: Nobody needs a smile so much as the one who has none to give. So get used to smiling heart-warming smiles, and you will spread sunshine in a sometimes dreary world.
data.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

data.quote: Good Deeds Day is based on a simple idea that every person can do a good deed for the benefit of others and the planet. Even a smile that brightens someone else's day is a good deed. I initiated Good Deeds Day to spread the message that everyone can give of themselves, according to their heart's desire.
data.author: Shari Arison

data.quote: I wake up each and every day with a smile on my face knowing I get to do something musically.
data.author: Two Chainz

data.quote: A smile is like an instant facelift and an instant mood lift.
data.author: Christie Brinkley

data.quote: I used to rely on black-and-white, and while I was working on 'Smile,' I learned to adapt to color on my end.
data.author: Raina Telgemeier

data.quote: Virtue is not photogenic. What is it to be a nice guy? To be nothing, that's what. A big fat zero with a smile for everybody.
data.author: Kirk Douglas

data.quote: I like joy; I want to be joyous; I want to have fun on the set; I want to wear beautiful clothes and look pretty. I want to smile, and I want to make people laugh. And that's all I want. I like it. I like being happy. I want to make others happy.
data.author: Doris Day

data.quote: Always wear a smile sometime during the day - it makes you feel happier and look younger.
data.author: Kylie Bax

data.quote: Yes sir, I am a tortured man for all seasons, as they say, and I have powerful friends in high places. Birds sing where I walk, and children smile when they see me coming.
data.author: Hunter S. Thompson

data.quote: A beautiful person is someone who stays true to themselves and their spirit someone who is self-confident and can make you smile.
data.author: Helena Christensen

data.quote: I believe that when you put a smile out there, you get a smile back.
data.author: Heidi Klum

data.quote: Empathy is the faculty to resonate with the feelings of others. When we meet someone who is joyful, we smile. When we witness someone in pain, we suffer in resonance with his or her suffering.
data.author: Matthieu Ricard

data.quote: The purpose of Disneyland is to make people smile.
data.author: Kevin Plank

data.quote: I'm a very outgoing person. I'm always happy, I'm one of those people who are always smiling. If somebody described me to somebody else, they'd say the kid with the curly hair with the big smile on his face. I get along with everybody.
data.author: Corbin Bleu

data.quote: I was one of those weird kids who didn't really speak or smile. I remember my teachers would call home and ask if everything was fine at home because I would never smile. Then I got into this phase, from maybe fourth to eighth grade, where my personality just did a 180.
data.author: Alessia Cara

data.quote: I didn't know how to smile for the paparazzi.
data.author: Peggy Lipton

data.quote: The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
data.author: Malcolm de Chazal

data.quote: I never smile unless I mean it.
data.author: Donny Osmond

data.quote: When I look out at the people and they look at me and they're smiling, then I know that I'm loved. That is the time when I have no worries, no problems.
data.author: Etta James

data.quote: There's something about the ukulele that just makes you smile. It makes you let your guard down. It brings out the child in all of us.
data.author: Jake Shimabukuro

data.quote: Don't write anything you can phone. Don't phone anything you can talk. Don't talk anything you can whisper. Don't whisper anything you can smile. Don't smile anything you can nod. Don't nod anything you can wink.
data.author: Earl Long

data.quote: I actually used to smile a lot in pictures. I think I only stopped smiling when I got into fashion. Fashion stole my smile!
data.author: Victoria Beckham

data.quote: Standing as a witness in all things means being kind in all things, being the first to say hello, being the first to smile, being the first to make the stranger feel a part of things, being helpful, thinking of others' feelings, being inclusive.
data.author: Margaret D. Nadauld

data.quote: Great men show politeness in a particular way; a smile suffices to assure you that you are welcome, and keep about their avocations as if you were a member of the family.
data.author: John James Audubon

data.quote: It's so hard not to smile.
data.author: Zoe Sugg

data.quote: The catch phrase for the day is 'Do an act of kindness. Help one person smile.'
data.author: Harvey Ball

data.quote: And if you see me, smile and maybe give me a hug. That's important to me too.
data.author: Jim Valvano

data.quote: Smile at a stranger. See what happens.
data.author: Patti LuPone

data.quote: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
data.author: Bret Harte

data.quote: I have a nice smile, pretty lips, and big round cheeks. They help me look like a teenager.
data.author: Gabourey Sidibe

data.quote: She felt like a chess player who, by the clever handling of his pieces, sees the game taking the course intended. Her eyes were bright and tender with a smile as they glanced up into his; and her lips looked hungry for the kiss which they invited.
data.author: Kate Chopin

data.quote: I think I've always had a certain amount of skepticism of this whole 'shut up and smile' theory. I haven't ever swallowed that pill so easily, although I tried.
data.author: Amber Heard

data.quote: Power doesn't back up in the face of a smile, or in the face of a threat of some kind of nonviolent loving action. It's not the nature of power to back up in the face of anything but some more power.
data.author: Malcolm X

data.quote: We smile at the ignorance of the savage who cuts down the tree in order to reach its fruit but the same blunder is made by every person who is over eager and impatient in the pursuit of pleasure.
data.author: William Ellery Channing

data.quote: And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears.
data.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

data.quote: They might not need me but they might. I'll let my head be just in sight a smile as small as mine might be precisely their necessity.
data.author: Emily Dickinson

data.quote: Laughter is day, and sobriety is night; a smile is the twilight that hovers gently between both, more bewitching than either.
data.author: Henry Ward Beecher

data.quote: To smile at the jest which plants a thorn in another's breast is to become a principal in the mischief.
data.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

data.quote: I've never wanted anybody to like me because I had long hair or short hair, or that they liked the way I dressed or they liked the way I dressed or they liked the way I smile.
data.author: David Allan Coe

data.quote: Winning the World Cup was very special because it meant so much to so many. One thing about our country that is constant is cricket. The smile it brought to people's faces was the thing I shall always remember. It reminded me, reminded all of us, of our importance to the lives of the Indian people less lucky than we are.
data.author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

data.quote: You have to promote yourself you have to have this smile on your face all the time and be this nice guy - which I am!
data.author: Craig Roberts

data.quote: When you smile, you don't only appear to be more likable and courteous, you appear to be more competent.
data.author: Ron Gutman

data.quote: Not by appointment do we meet delight Or joy they heed not our expectancy But round some corner of the streets of life they of a sudden greet us with a smile.
data.author: Gerald Massey

data.quote: A smile is a facelift that's in everyone's price range!
data.author: Tom Wilson

data.quote: I feel like a little kid who just walked into a candy store. I think that's something to smile about.
data.author: Brandon Boyd

data.quote: Breathing in, I am aware of my heart. Breathing out, I smile to my heart and know that my heart still functions normally. I feel grateful for my heart.
data.author: Nhat Hanh

data.quote: A tip for looking 'picture perfect' is probably a smile. I think everyone looks better when they are happy you give off a glow - or at least that is what my mum would say!
data.author: Amber Le Bon

data.quote: Each one of us can do a good deed, every day and everywhere. In hospitals in desperate need of volunteers, in homes for the elderly where our parents and grandparents are longing for a smile, a listening ear, in the street, in our workplaces and especially at home.
data.author: Shari Arison

data.quote: Once every lunar eclipse, you should be able to see me smile!
data.author: Sophie Turner

data.quote: I don't know what I would have done without believing in God. His support gives me power and energy to continue to be optimistic, to smile, not to be depressed. Sometimes, if things are not going so well, I don't cry. I say maybe it's meant to be.
data.author: Ofra Haza

data.quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
data.author: Raymond Chandler

data.quote: You know, I've got wrinkles on my forehead and smile lines, but what's wrong with that? I love to smile.
data.author: Jennifer Aniston

data.quote: The bat is gone, but the smile remains.
data.author: Willie Stargell

data.quote: When I see people laughing at ideas and companies we have backed, I smile. It means we are going to make a lot of money on that investment.
data.author: Fred Wilson

data.quote: It is impossible to persuade a man who does not disagree, but smiles.
data.author: Muriel Spark

data.quote: The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
data.author: Oliver Goldsmith

data.quote: I want to touch the heart of the world and make it smile.
data.author: Charles de Lint

data.quote: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
data.author: Diane Lane

data.quote: I've always spent more time with a smile on my face than not, but the thing is, I don't write about it.
data.author: Robert Smith

data.quote: It takes a man to suffer ignorance and smile.
data.author: Sting

data.quote: One of the most important responsibilities in the Christian life is to care about others, smile at them, and be a friend to the friendless.
data.author: James Dobson

data.quote: Get up and dance, get up and smile, get up and drink to the days that are gone in the shortest while.
data.author: Simon Fowler

data.quote: We may smile at these matters, but they are melancholy illustrations.
data.author: Joseph Howe

data.quote: You see, with me, when I'm nervous, I smile and laugh.
data.author: Paula Radcliffe

data.quote: Well, there's nothing more touching than putting a smile on a kid's face when you can.
data.author: Emma Roberts

data.quote: Some people say they have a thirst for life. They're excited about every day and they're prepared to look the bad and the good straight in the face and greet it all with a smile. I like to think I'm one of those people.
data.author: Amy Jo Martin

data.quote: I don't think I was a good model. I think I was born to emote and act. I would walk down the ramp and smile and they used to say, 'Give us a blank look.' It was really difficult not to smile.
data.author: Anushka Sharma

data.quote: Grit your teeth and smile. In the face of adversity, go. They don't deserve you.
data.author: Christine Lagarde

data.quote: As cheesy as it sounds, nothing beats a smile and a bit of confidence! As long as you feel good on the inside, you can still look beautiful without any makeup at all.
data.author: Zoe Sugg

data.quote: The pilgrim is humble and devout, and human, and charitable, and ready to smile and admire; therefore, he should comprehend the whole of his way, the people in it, and the hills and the clouds, and the habits of the various cities.
data.author: Hilaire Belloc

data.quote: Comrades, this man has a nice smile, but he's got iron teeth.
data.author: Andrei A. Gromyko

data.quote: I hoped I could make people smile and laugh and have a good time.
data.author: Carson Kressley

data.quote: You get somebody to crack a smile, that's a beautiful thing.
data.author: Tracy Morgan

data.quote: The last time I saw Ted Kennedy was a generation after my first meeting, at the Senate subway below the Capitol on Obama's Inauguration Day. He was his usual gregarious and gracious self - with beaming smile and booming voice wishing my husband and me good luck with our pregnancy and expressing his excitement about the new president.
data.author: Christine Pelosi

data.quote: When we run out of them upstairs, I've been known to appropriate some from our greenroom, pocketing a few with one hand as I smile and greet our guests with the other. One time, Dave Zinczenko of 'Eat this, Not That!' fame, busted me in the act. The cookies apparently fall in the 'not that' category. I made a note of it.
data.author: Lester Holt

data.quote: Most babies know how to win us over. We cannot help but smile at them and watch them smile back.
data.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

data.quote: It hurts when you have to smile and you don't want to smile, but the best thing to do is to smile.
data.author: Mary J. Blige

data.quote: There are just some really beautiful people in the world. When you're walking down the street, or you're at a restaurant, someone catches your eye because they have their own look. It goes way beyond what they're wearing - into their mannerisms, the way they smile, or just the way they hold themselves.
data.author: Mary-Kate Olsen

data.quote: For me, relationship is very important. I can lose money, but I cannot lose a relationship. The test is, at the end of a conversation or a negotiation, both must smile.
data.author: Sunil Mittal

data.quote: As a former waitress myself, I know firsthand how a simple smile from someone can improve your day and how a single harsh word can destroy it. Being courteous and thoughtful costs you nothing and can sometimes pay you dividends in unexpected ways.
data.author: Susanna Kearsley

data.quote: I had the opportunity to go into the hospitals and talk to kids and see a kid and make him smile. Why? Because I'm a special person? No. It had nothing to do with that. It has everything to do with me being the quarterback at the University of Florida. And to not take advantage of that is a shame.
data.author: Tim Tebow

data.quote: My new dressing goal is to make little kids and babies smile at all the bright, clashing colours I can wear at once. It makes me laugh when I catch sight of my own reflection - life is too short not have fun!
data.author: Liz Goldwyn

data.quote: Nothing can resist the person who smiles at life - I don't mean the ironic and disillusioned smile of my grandfather, but the triumphant smile of the person who knows that he will survive, or that at least he will be saved by what seems to be destroying him.
data.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

data.quote: Every bit of joy in my heart, you know, every smile on my face is yours. It's awesome to be able to share that with somebody.
data.author: Brantley Gilbert

data.quote: I still don't love the darkness, though I've learned to smile in it a little bit, now and then.
data.author: Billy Crystal

data.quote: I made a circle with a smile for a mouth on yellow paper, because it was sunshiny and bright.
data.author: Harvey Ball

data.quote: What looks like enjoyment is the sneer of contempt. That's not a smile.
data.author: Jack Kevorkian

data.quote: As long as you smile, have sparkly eyes and stick your shoulders back, nobody's going to notice your bum or your waist or your feet, for that matter.
data.author: Cat Deeley

data.quote: When you're walking down the street, or you're at a restaurant, someone catches your eye because they have their own look. It goes way beyond what they're wearing - into their mannerisms, the way they smile, or just the way they hold themselves.
data.author: Mary-Kate Olsen

data.quote: Ever since I was four years old, I loved making people smile, making them think, making them feel good, feel some kind of emotion.
data.author: Ann-Margret

data.quote: I definitely want to continue working in independent films - and big budget stuff as well - but there's a freedom you have when you're not getting paid. It's easier to say no and there's no pressure to please the powers that be. Also I don't have to hear 'flirt and smile more.'
data.author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

data.quote: On 'America's Top Model,' I've always told my girls to smile with their eyes. We call it 'smizing.' Over the years, it's actually become part of pop culture. I would be walking down the street, and girls would say, 'Smize!'
data.author: Tyra Banks

data.quote: After my husband John Lennon passed away, I tried to smile for my health.
data.author: Yoko Ono

data.quote: For me, fragrances are very - one of these beautiful art forms that bring about a whole host of things. It's what you want to smell like, it's memories that make you smile or are resonant of times in your life, it can remind you of music. If you're a lover of scent, it's a very kind of particular and evocative thing.
data.author: Chris Pine

data.quote: God blessed me with two unbelievable parents, and I am just like both of them. I have the smile and charisma of my mother and the big heart of my mom, because she wants to save the world and help the world, so I am just like her.
data.author: Magic Johnson

data.quote: It's sort of a feeling of power onstage. It's really the ability to make people smile, or just to turn them one way or another for that duration of time, and for it to have some effect later on. I don't really think it's power... it's the goodness.
data.author: Robert Plant

data.quote: I think music, in my opinion, is not about motivation in the way it's - it's not a running base. It's art. And my whole philosophy of music is different. It's almost like cooking and serving to people, seeing them smile and enjoying the food, really.
data.author: A. R. Rahman

data.quote: There are certain expectations that are put on you as a child actor, but mainly it's just turn up and say your lines with a lot of energy and a cute smile.
data.author: Naomie Harris

data.quote: Don't let people see when you're mad - just smile and laugh.
data.author: Astro

data.quote: We should celebrate how amazing our bodies are! We all have things that we like and dislike about our bodies, but we need to focus on what we love - maybe it's a great smile, strong legs or curly hair?
data.author: Katherine Schwarzenegger

data.quote: It scares you: all the noise, the rattling, the shaking. But the look on everybody's face when you're finished and packing, it's the best smile in the world; and there's nobody hurt, and the well's under control.
data.author: Red Adair

data.quote: Let me smile with the wise, and feed with the rich.
data.author: Samuel Johnson

data.quote: Usually, if you smile at them and show some interest in the toy, they will give it to you. That's a straight up Democrat move!
data.author: Margaret Cho

data.quote: I retire with a smile on my face, in good health, and ready to spend autumns at my kids' games instead of my own. I'm excited to start the next chapter of my life.
data.author: Drew Bledsoe

data.quote: It is boorish to live ungraciously: the giving is the hardest part what does it cost to add a smile?
data.author: Jean de la Bruyere

data.quote: I have two rules for a great book: make me think and make me smile.
data.author: Adam Grant

data.quote: I truly believe my job is to make sure people smile.
data.author: Shah Rukh Khan

data.quote: I like to smile. I smile even when I'm nervous since it calms me down and shows my friendliness.
data.author: Yani Tseng

data.quote: Joy's smile is much closer to tears than laughter.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: If the Starbucks secret is a smile when you get your latte... ours is that the Web site adapts to the individual's taste.
data.author: Reed Hastings

data.quote: To you wives who are constantly complaining and see only the dark side of life, and feel that you are unloved and unwanted, look into your own hearts and minds. If there is something wrong, turn about. Put a smile on your faces. Make yourselves more attractive. Brighten your outlook.
data.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

data.quote: I wake up every day with a smile on my face.
data.author: Bob Diamond

data.quote: A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities.
data.author: Herman Melville

data.quote: Thinking about your training should put a smile on your face. As cliche as it sounds, you are worth all the time and energy you've put in. Unleash your emotions with a cheer, or even a signature roar, after a tough workout.
data.author: Summer Sanders

data.quote: We are entertainers. We have to give our audience a good time. If my name serves that purpose, if that brings a smile on your face, then I think it is good and my job has been done.
data.author: Tiger Shroff

data.quote: A stale article, if you dip it in a good, warm, sunny smile, will go off better than a fresh one that you've scowled upon.
data.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

data.quote: If you're able to help some people and make them smile and make them realize that life is good, then that's worth so much more than buying a pair of shoes.
data.author: Maria Sharapova

data.quote: I think it's really important that I'm not the only model in the world that goes through personal problems. People forget that we're human. We don't get to call in sick. You have to go and put on a smile. Every single day is a first impression, so you can't have a bummed-out day.
data.author: Gigi Hadid

data.quote: I'm not the athlete I was when I was training for the Olympics in '92 or when I was working out every single day. I have to live in moderation: I work out three or four days a week, and I smile while I'm working out - I really do enjoy it. I work out with my girlfriends and make it a social competition.
data.author: Summer Sanders

data.quote: 'Tis easy enough to be pleasant, When life flows along like a song; But the man worth while is the one who will smile when everything goes dead wrong.
data.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

data.quote: There are those who believe that the value of a children's book can be measured only in terms of the moral lessons it tries to impose or the perfect role models it offers. Personally, I happen to think that a book is of extraordinary value if it gives the reader nothing more than a smile or two. In fact, I happen to think that's huge.
data.author: Barbara Park

data.quote: Acting is a sense of wonder and magic and mystery for me and when life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
data.author: Andrea Thompson

data.quote: Mind you, physical training doesn't necessarily mean going to an expert for advice. One doesn't have to make a mountain out of a molehill. Get out in the fresh air and walk briskly - and don't forget to wear a smile while you're at it. Don't over-do. Take it easy at first and build on your effort day by day.
data.author: Douglas Fairbanks

data.quote: I don't smile as much as I should, even though I smile inside a lot.
data.author: James Patterson

data.quote: Obama's stern demeanor punctuated by intermittent flashes of his wide, relaxing smile is his greatest weapon in defusing pent-up angst.
data.author: Tina Brown

data.quote: I get accused of having a haughty smugness. I have a lopsided mouth. I can't help it. I was born with it. It looks as if I am smirking. I have had my publicist tell me, 'Don't do that smile on the red carpet.' I'm, like, 'That's my smile.'
data.author: Natalie Dormer

data.quote: Giving back is the right thing to do, whether it's donating clothing or even just a smile to someone who needs it.
data.author: Becky G

data.quote: I've just got a really bad smile. I go for the scowl instead.
data.author: Jason Statham

data.quote: You learn to laugh at yourself, and you also lean on comedy as a crutch to kind of take the edge off because comedians often are self-deprecating, and they cross lines that they shouldn't. Stuff like that brings a smile to my face every once in a while when needed.
data.author: John Cena

data.quote: Have you seen these Japanese hospital droids, or humanoids, or whatever they call it? They've perfected the skin, and the skin looks so real. They have these motors between the eyes for when they smile. It's just mind-blowing.
data.author: Joel Kinnaman

data.quote: The man who can smile when things go wrong has thought of someone else he can blame it on.
data.author: Robert Bloch

data.quote: A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
data.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

data.quote: Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
data.author: Thomas Gray

data.quote: We sometimes laugh from ear to ear, but it would be impossible for a smile to be wider than the distance between our eyes.
data.author: Malcolm de Chazal

data.quote: Right now, I'm following the Buddhist principle: Smile as abuse is hurled your way and this too shall pass.
data.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

data.quote: Allowing yourself to smile takes 99% of the effort.
data.author: Simon Travaglia

data.quote: But with exquisite breathing you smile, with satisfaction of love, And I touch you again as you tick in the silence and settle in sleep.
data.author: Karl Shapiro

data.quote: Some people know that they are so adorable looking, all they have to do is smile and dress up and they get plenty from that. Then there are some of us who, early on, see that that doesn't work. So we joke about it.
data.author: Merrill Markoe

data.quote: If you want to meet a woman, it's best just to smile and say hi.
data.author: Karen McDougal

data.quote: Laughter is regional: a smile extends over the whole face.
data.author: Malcolm de Chazal

data.quote: I'm as happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
data.author: Samuel Smiles

data.quote: There is not a soul who does not have to beg alms of another, either a smile, a handshake, or a fond eye.
data.author: Lord Acton

data.quote: People always say golfers don't smile. But there is so much psychology in golf so we have to be a bit robotic.
data.author: Lee Westwood

data.quote: I just want to make people smile.
data.author: Julie Garwood

data.quote: If you force yourself to smile, within a couple minutes, you feel happy.
data.author: Dean Norris

data.quote: Just because a situation is grim doesn't mean you don't have every right to smile.
data.author: Rashida Jones

data.quote: I always said that if I could just find a guy who could chop wood and had a nice smile, it wouldn't bother me if he was a thug or an aristocrat, as long as he was a good guy. And I've ended up with an educated thug.
data.author: Sade Adu

data.quote: If I'm a bad mood, I can't go on stage and smile.
data.author: Grimes

data.quote: There is no greater feeling in business than building a product which impacts people's lives in a profound way. When we look around at the thousands of people who have attended Summit gatherings, it makes us smile to see the new friendships, business partnerships and philanthropic initiatives that each event produces.
data.author: Elliott Bisnow

data.quote: Sometimes you say things with a smile with the precise intention of making it clear that you are not being serious, and are only kidding. If I salute a friend with a smile and say, 'How are you, you old scoundrel!' clearly I don't really mean he's a scoundrel.
data.author: Umberto Eco

data.quote: I think a smile can make your whole body. Models, they look fabulous, but they don't smile, and they look so mad.
data.author: Serena Williams

data.quote: If women had to promise to provide for a man for a lifetime before he removed his veil and showed her his smile, would we think of this as a system of female privilege?
data.author: Warren Farrell

data.quote: I am generally a very happy and easygoing person. I also believe it's always better to meet people with a smile rather than looking cold, especially when you first meet. It changes everything.
data.author: Heidi Klum

data.quote: I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
data.author: Donald Dunn

data.quote: I eat every two hours. I sleep for eight hours. I have lots of water. I pray to keep calm. Most importantly, I have a smile on my face.
data.author: Vidya Balan

data.quote: Even a smile is a good deed.
data.author: Shari Arison

data.quote: There's nothing like seeing the smile on my kids' faces. Laughing together. Playing. It's the best.
data.author: Mark Wahlberg

data.quote: As a female, you are often being asked by directors to be warmer, softer, flirt more, smile more etc... None of those things are bad, and obviously we are capable of a variety of human behavior, but it gets really old having to play into somebody's stereotype or ideal.
data.author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

data.quote: If you cannot smile when you listen to music, then do not listen to it!
data.author: Estelle

data.quote: More people smile at me now I'm richer.
data.author: Mo Ibrahim

data.quote: Once you don't smile on film, they say, 'Let's have that bloke who doesn't smile.'
data.author: Richard C. Armitage

data.quote: Y'know, smile, dance, get crazy... we sure do while we're making it, because music is our leeezshure; it's my fun.
data.author: Bernard Edwards

data.quote: No matter what I put out, somebody will be offended. I made a video on 10 reasons to smile, and it has dislikes. That should be an indication that there will be some who get offended no matter what you do. The best you can do as an entertainer or as someone who performs is to follow what you believe in.
data.author: Lilly Singh

data.quote: 'Chef' is a dish of arroz con pollo served with a smile but not much style. The critic in the film would give it a low grade, for agreeability without ambition.
data.author: Richard Corliss

data.quote: Not everything is going to be handed to you just because you're talented with a big smile. Sometimes you just gotta get out and shoot jumpers for hours and hours and hours. That's something I didn't really get a grasp on until way later, waking up early and treating it like a job if you're serious about it. Get the freak up and, you know, work.
data.author: Anderson Paak

data.quote: People want to start their day off with a smile or, better yet, a guffaw.
data.author: George Takei

data.quote: Pictorial is something that I am not used to. You have to pose, smile, bend your arm, straighten up, look to the left.
data.author: Benigno Aquino III

data.quote: When onstage, I always try to take my audience through as many emotions as I possibly can. I want them to go from laughter to tears, be shocked and surprised and walk out the door with a renewed sense of themselves - and maybe a smile.
data.author: Reba McEntire

data.quote: No, I like to wear as least amount of makeup as I can during my everyday life because I'm just all about keeping my skin healthy and hydrated and I love to laugh and have a great time and smile - that's when I feel the most pretty so I just want to make sure that I stay happy.
data.author: Lily Collins

data.quote: Smiles come naturally to me, but I started thinking of them as an art form at my command. I studied all the time. I looked at magazines, I'd practice in front of the mirror and I'd ask photographers about the best angles. I can now pull out a smile at will.
data.author: Tyra Banks

data.quote: If what I have to do is share a sandwich to lift someone's spirits, put a smile on their face - the worst thing that happens is I go broke!
data.author: Jose Andres

data.quote: I am so happy to be alive. That's the one thing I'd like for people to know. Sometimes people walk by and slip up and say the wrong thing about me, and I'll smile. They wonder why am I smiling. Because I'm happy that I'm alive.
data.author: George Foreman

data.quote: When I take my kids out for dinner or lunch, people smile at us.
data.author: Louis C. K.

data.quote: I come from a place where everything about me, even my body language, is saying: I mean you no harm. I smile, I laugh. Basic stuff for most people.
data.author: Oscar Isaac

data.quote: Advice from my experience, for me, I've never taken no as an answer, I don't believe in that. If I want something, I'm going to get it. When people tell me that I can't do something, it just motivates me more. For me, it makes me smile, because I just want to prove everybody wrong.
data.author: Roman Reigns

data.quote: I've had more ups than downs in my career. All you can do is keep working. You still have to take enjoyment out of what you're doing, and things will turn, and my smile has always been there. In good moments and bad.
data.author: Eden Hazard

data.quote: There are so many beautiful things that are a part of the world, and I've always looked at life that way; I've always tried to put on a smile and a brave front, not just for my kids but in my own life and all the difficulties that I've gone through.
data.author: Gloria Estefan

data.quote: Everything about 'UY' is new and fresh, and we are extremely happy at the response from the audiences, as most people are walking out of cinema halls with a smile on their faces.
data.author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

data.quote: If you walk down the street and smile at someone, that will get passed on to the next person. That has the power to change someone's day.
data.author: Julianna Margulies

data.quote: With my father and sister being very depressed for most of their lives, it was incumbent on me to try to make them laugh, in this ridiculous way. They were the wittiest people I knew, but to get a smile from them was like winning the lottery.
data.author: Miriam Toews

data.quote: It's important to maintain an attractive smile as you age. A lighter, less beige, more white tooth color is key, but no Chiclets.
data.author: Evelyn Lauder

data.quote: The smile of God is victory.
data.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

data.quote: Reproof on her lip, but a smile in her eye.
data.author: Samuel Lover

data.quote: Generally, when a record label suggests album ideas for you, you smile politely, and then proceed to shoot it down, because it's never what you as an artist feel is right for you.
data.author: John Scofield

data.quote: When you walk into a room, a healthy, beautiful smile is incredibly important.
data.author: Susan Anton

data.quote: When I see myself on film it makes me smile, I mean making a good living doing what I enjoy is soo much fun. I just hope that everyone has the chance to enjoy life like I do.
data.author: Adrienne Barbeau

data.quote: Go, forget me - why should sorrow, O'er that brow a shadow fling? Go, forget me - and tomorrow, brightly smile and sweetly sing. Smile - though I shall not be near thee; Sing - though I shall never hear thee.
data.author: Charles Wolfe

data.quote: We ought to be beating our chests every day. We ought to look in the mirror, stick out our chests, suck in our bellies, and say, 'Damn, we're Americans,' and smile.
data.author: Jay Garner

data.quote: The truth is that when Lennon is Bosephus, she is so mean to me. She can't smile because the mustache will come off. So in between takes, it's just scowling. And then when we are on camera, Bosephus treats me like a piece of meat. I'm repulsed and also attracted to it.
data.author: Jessica St. Clair

data.quote: Sometimes people have questioned whether I was making fun of the industry or just at myself. I'm just trying to raise a smile. Clothes aren't meant to be worshipped at a church altar.
data.author: Jeremy Scott

data.quote: At one time, you could sit on the Rue de la Paix in Paris or at the Habima Theater in Tel Aviv or in Medina and you could see a person come in, black, white, it didn't matter. You said, 'That's an American' because there's a readiness to smile and to talk to people.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: 'SMiLE' is perhaps the Beach Boys' most legendary album. It was recorded in 1966 and 1967 but only saw a formal release in 2011. That's a long time to wait for what was said to be Brian Wilson's masterpiece.
data.author: Henry Rollins

data.quote: A bland smile is like a green light at an intersection, it feels good when you get one, but you forget it the moment you're past it.
data.author: Douglas Coupland

data.quote: We've all met those who seem to radiate happiness. They seem to smile more than others they laugh more than others - just being around them makes us happier as well.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: Jesus wept Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: I've learned to lose with a smile on my face. That's what the Oscar teaches you.
data.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

data.quote: I'm not this callous clown walking around laughing at life all the time. I've had some serious, serious problems in my life. But I've come out with a smile.
data.author: John Lydon

data.quote: So, my style has hopefully changed over the years and it is more relaxed, and I do tend to smile and have more than one expression these days hopefully - which I didn't at the beginning.
data.author: Jo Brand

data.quote: Sometimes when I'm being photographed, I hear the voice of this photographer who told me when I was about six while he was taking my school photo that I didn't have a nice smile, and I shouldn't smile in photos.
data.author: Brad Goreski

data.quote: I've told several writers this, and, again, I get back to it, but if you want to make God smile, tell him your plans.
data.author: Vin Scully

data.quote: I would try to promote something that I loved, and the entire interview would be about my personal life. I would leave a room feeling defeated, feeling embarrassed, but I would always make sure to put that smile on my face because I wasn't going to let them get to me.
data.author: Selena Gomez

data.quote: I'm so envious of that genetic wiring that immediately puts a smile on your face. My genetic wiring just puts creases in my eyebrows.
data.author: Chris Pine

data.quote: City Ballet has to develop choreographers of stature and a new approach to coaching before everything we value about it fades away and, in the great tradition of the Cheshire Cat, there's nothing left but Peter Martins' smile.
data.author: Robert Gottlieb

data.quote: I was talking to a guy who was holding his 18-month-old daughter with the only limb he had left, and he had a smile on his face. I thought, 'I'm not even a 10th of this man.'
data.author: Ron White

data.quote: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
data.author: Goldie Hawn

data.quote: A body smiles, like, 72 times a day. Where does that smile go? That's what I want to know.
data.author: Goldie Hawn

data.quote: In general, men are wired to notice obvious signs that convey interest in mating - a warm smile, for example - and ignore other subtleties, like if your lipstick is faded.
data.author: Helen Fisher

data.quote: It's true that a smile can take years off a person - not that such a thing matters in Yoko Ono's case.
data.author: Elvis Mitchell

data.quote: My children and my husband make me smile. My work makes me smile.
data.author: Victoria Beckham

data.quote: I loved the Kennedy Center Honors because you just sit there, smile, wave, and cry.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: Let him who expects one class of society to prosper in the highest degree, while the other is in distress, try whether one side; of the face can smile while the other is pinched.
data.author: Thomas Fuller

data.quote: Of course I used to smile and laugh in 1976, but not when I was competing. Please show me somebody who laughs when they are concentrating; I always smiled.
data.author: Nadia Comaneci

data.quote: I'm a happy guy. I just want to see people laugh and smile.
data.author: Gerry Cooney

data.quote: I don't smile a lot in my pictures. I'm always so... grim.
data.author: Michael Douglas

data.quote: I am so saddened and grossed out by young women who look like creepy, old aliens because of their new Barbie noses and lips. Is that a smile or a grimace?
data.author: Olivia Wilde

data.quote: There's an old adage about speakers: You won't remember what they said, but you'll never forget how they made you feel. Trump knows that in his bones. He gives his supporters - and they are growing - a terrific feeling of safety and security, along with a laugh and a smile.
data.author: Cass Sunstein

data.quote: I never realized before this the emotional power of some really simple, corny tropes: people with top hats, people with batons, confetti going off, how important it is to smile.
data.author: Ira Glass

data.quote: I hated the ballet, but I liked performing. I did 20 shows, and I couldn't get the smile off my face.
data.author: Ansel Elgort

data.quote: The very best hotel I've stayed in is the Intercontinental on Park Lane. We went there for the Chelsea Flower Show a few years ago, and it was sheer luxury. Everybody had a smile on their face. I came home and changed all my pillows because the hotel ones were so beautiful.
data.author: Mary Berry

data.quote: Comedians like to see people smile. With acting, I love giving people a feeling, an emotion. I like to give people a feeling. When they come away from my scene, I want them to think.
data.author: Keke Palmer

data.quote: I feel like looking in the mirror when you brush your teeth, yes, I see lines, and then I smile and I see things here and there. But that's just, you know, you - that's your journey, you know?
data.author: Heidi Klum

data.quote: When I came into office, people said, 'Billionaire? How do they live? What do they eat? How do they sleep?' Today, they see me on the subway coming uptown. A couple of people say hi, some people smile and nod. Some people just sleep. It's not an issue.
data.author: Michael Bloomberg

data.quote: I've been dealing with the press for 45 years. You need a very long spoon to sup with them. While you are always grateful, they are like badly trained dogs. They smile and wag and bite your arm off.
data.author: Joanna Lumley

data.quote: Our aim is to develop affectionate robots that can make people smile.
data.author: Masayoshi Son

data.quote: I have a few go-to moves like jazz hands, shake the booty, stupid eyes. It was once a mating ritual, but now it's all about looking silly and making the kids smile.
data.author: John Cho

data.quote: Actors are supposed to be these runaways that get in a covered wagon filled with hats and tambourines and go from town to town making people smile.
data.author: John Cho

data.quote: I'm all about people that appreciate, that are grateful, that smile, that have a sense of humour - the dirtier the laugh, the better- that's my kind of vibe... and I hope that's the kind of thing that I attract.
data.author: Poppy Delevingne

data.quote: As a New Yorker, this is what you do: you confront, jab, and slap, sometimes wrongly, then smile and forget about it.
data.author: Greg Gutfeld

data.quote: I always remember this neighbor who would ask me to babysit for her. She looked like Jayne Mansfield, and I remember babysitting for, like, five hours and she would pay me 80 cents, with a phony smile. I used to go home fuming to my mum.
data.author: Jennifer Coolidge

data.quote: When men have a smile on their faces, that does a lot for me.
data.author: Michelle Yeoh

data.quote: If you can't relax during your interview, then nothing you do to prepare will matter. Being yourself is essential to the selection process, and interviewers will feel it if you're too nervous. Showing fear or anxiety appears weak compared to a relaxed smile and genuine confidence.
data.author: Travis Bradberry

data.quote: When I'm getting a chance to do my job or make somebody's day, and be on stage where I love, and see all the fans having fun, you can't help but smile.
data.author: Cole Swindell

data.quote: I am happy at Tottenham. I go into work every day with a smile on my face, and that is important.
data.author: Harry Kane

data.quote: I have a great smile. A lot of people don't know that.
data.author: Draymond Green

data.quote: Scarlett Johansson has a smile she tries to suppress in every movie she makes. She's been trying to keep a straight face since she appeared with Bill Murray 11 years ago in her breakthrough, 'Lost in Translation.'
data.author: Steve Erickson

data.quote: On the red carpet, one tip is to suck in your cheekbones - apparently it looks better on camera. I don't know, though; I think a nice smile is best.
data.author: David Harewood

data.quote: Some people are fighting much, much more important battles and much bigger battles, and if we get the chance to put a smile on their face for ten seconds, it's so worth it.
data.author: Dolph Ziggler

data.quote: I live to leave somebody with a positive experience when they've met me, and make someone smile for the day.
data.author: Dolph Ziggler

data.quote: Make people have a smile when they finish your e-mail.
data.author: Letitia Baldrige

data.quote: I'm honest and tell it like it is. I've been around the horn a few times and learned valuable lessons from screwing up a bit. So, if I can pass off advice or make someone smile on the way to work, I'm for it.
data.author: Stone Cold Steve Austin

data.quote: No connection to the average voter - Clinton has an air of superiority. Despite her wide smile and pleasant appearance, she is envisioned as someone who is trying to hide something all the time.
data.author: Fabrizio Moreira

data.quote: The NBA Schedule was made up by one man, Eddie Gottlieb, who had owned the Philadelphia Warriors. Eddie had a Buddha-like body and a crinkly smile, and because he had also been an owner in baseball's old Negro leagues, he was known as the Mogul.
data.author: Frank Deford

data.quote: Tears are sometimes an inappropriate response to death. When a life has been lived completely honestly, completely successfully, or just completely, the correct response to death's perfect punctuation mark is a smile.
data.author: Julie Burchill

data.quote: I will tell you with 100 percent confidence, Jon Jones is not deep in my head. The fact he actually thinks that, it makes me smile every day.
data.author: Daniel Cormier

data.quote: Every now and then, someone will tell me that one of my books has made them laugh out loud. I never believe them because: a.) my books don't make me laugh out loud; and b.) sometimes I have said this to a writer, when really what I meant was, 'Your book made me smile appreciatively.'
data.author: Mary Roach

data.quote: If you're in my shoes, and your goal is to leave people with the biggest possible smile on their face, then doing the meet-and-greet afterwards makes sense.
data.author: Mick Foley

data.quote: Kanye is so much fun. He's a wonderful person. What I love about Kim and Kanye is that I think they save their happy moments and their smiles for themselves rather than sharing everything with the public. And listen, when a camera is shoved in your face trying to take a selfie, you do not want to smile.
data.author: Chrissy Teigen

data.quote: As a model, I really stand for not being a model, if that makes sense. When I started, the whole idea of the model was very different; it was a bit stuck-up. Not stuck-up, but no one was trying to have fun, or not even have fun, but be willing to smile.
data.author: Cara Delevingne

data.quote: I cry at anything remotely touching - smile at me warmly and I'm off... television also does it, everything from 'X-Factor' to cereal commercials. I cry when I am tired. I also cry when I laugh.
data.author: Natalie Massenet

data.quote: I guess the news is this: If you're a Republican and you smile, liberals don't like it. Maybe that's because Democrats are afraid that I've been able to show an optimistic vision for this country.
data.author: Cory Gardner

data.quote: I'm a workhorse. I'll take anything and everything I can get, and I'll do it with a smile on my face.
data.author: Roman Reigns

data.quote: As I get older, I want to do more films for kids because they're the best audience around. Just putting a smile on a kid's face is the best thing.
data.author: James McAvoy

data.quote: Later in my life, I'm going to look back and smile and be very fulfilled. I know that if I don't give it my all right now I'll regret it later. That's very important to me, because I've worked all my life to have this.
data.author: Shania Twain

data.quote: Clinton's hands remain incredibly clean, don't they, and Tony Blair's smile remains as wide as ever. I view these guises with profound contempt.
data.author: Harold Pinter

data.quote: I get really frustrated if people don't smile.
data.author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

data.quote: Religion can emerge in all forms of feeling: here wild anger, there the sweetest pain; here consuming hatred, there the childlike smile of serene humility.
data.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

data.quote: I could be hit by a Sara Lee truck tomorrow. Which is not a bad way of going: 'Richard Simmons Found in a Freeway in Pound Cake and Fudge, With a Smile on His Face.' Let's face it. We don't know anything.
data.author: Richard Simmons

data.quote: I will have my publicist pull pictures of the way I look at events so I can see, 'Oh, that cut is not as flattering as I thought,' or 'I should smile bigger,' or 'That positioning is odd.' I learn from it.
data.author: Allison Williams

data.quote: I think Led Zeppelin must have worn some of the most peculiar clothing that men had ever been seen to wear without cracking a smile.
data.author: Robert Plant

data.quote: You know when someone's over-flattering you in a way. You smile but you can't believe it.
data.author: Laura Linney

data.quote: I wish to be appreciated not only as a film star but also for the person I am. If I manage to bring a smile on people's faces, then I think I'll be successful.
data.author: Deepika Padukone

data.quote: If you're authentic, people smile because they sense there's a piece of themselves there.
data.author: Bonnie Hunt

data.quote: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do.
data.author: Trent Franks

data.quote: Somebody said to me, 'Whenever somebody says your name, a smile comes to their face.' That's a great accolade. I strive to keep it that way.
data.author: Clarence Clemons

data.quote: My theory is, if you force yourself to smile enough, then you start to feel it. Which comes in handy all the time.
data.author: Erika Christensen

data.quote: Playing hard to get is not the way to win me over. I'm definitely more for the girl who can smile and laugh all the time and just have a good time!
data.author: Taylor Lautner

data.quote: Julia Roberts taught me how to knit on the set of 'Mona Lisa Smile.'
data.author: Julia Stiles

data.quote: I was walking around legally blind. Now I have 20-20 vision. I can't believe I spent so many years blurry, but I think that coincides with how I was feeling. Now I notice if people are watching me, but I also smile right back if someone waves, which helps.
data.author: Nicole Kidman

data.quote: I have always been a flirt. My mother says whe I was a child, I used to stand outside the house and just smile at everyone who walked by. Like, 'Please take me with you!'
data.author: bell hooks

data.quote: I just feel like people like a little break. Especially at 12:37 at night, you go, like, 'I'm just tired of the snarky right now. I just want to lie down and have somebody make me laugh for an hour. Entertain me, and then I'm going to sleep with a smile on my face.' That's my job; that's what I do.
data.author: Jimmy Fallon

data.quote: The coolest part about seeing a girl wear something comfortable is the smile that you can just feel coming through from inside her.
data.author: Kellan Lutz

data.quote: The 'good' mother, with her fixed smile, her rigidity, her goody-goody outlook, her obsession with unnecessary hygiene, is in fact a fool. It is the 'bad' mother, unafraid of a joke and a glass of wine, richly self-expressive, scornful of suburban values, who is, in reality, good.
data.author: Rachel Cusk

data.quote: I thought, 'It doesn't matter what that woman is wearing,' but then I realised actually it's our job as designers to make women smile; to bring them the chocolate without the calories.
data.author: Alber Elbaz

data.quote: For me, music makes my smile brighter during my workouts. It adds that extra something that motivates me to go further or work harder!
data.author: Summer Sanders

data.quote: We've been trained since kindergarten: Be nice, be kind, share, put on a smile. So we're conditioned to squash our natural selfish instincts, and that's the right thing for society.
data.author: Bryan Cranston

data.quote: I used to watch some of the reality shows about models, and then, weirdly, now I try to incorporate into my fashion shoots the skills I learnt from watching those shows. It's like, thanks Tyra, 'cause you've given me, like, all the cool tips. Like how to smile with your eyes.
data.author: Rebel Wilson

data.quote: You know, there's nothing like seeing the smile on my kids' faces. Laughing together. Playing. It's the best.
data.author: Mark Wahlberg

data.quote: I am trying to inspire people to just take control of their oral health, because if we don't take care of our oral health, it affects so many different aspects of our lives. If your smile and mouth is not together, it affects your relationship, your self-esteem, your health.
data.author: Sherri Shepherd

data.quote: I played the violin my whole life. I wanted to play from the time I was just a little kid, and I've always loved dance as well. I wanted to make people smile. I wanted to add an extra energy to my playing and make it visual and make it unique and fun.
data.author: Lindsey Stirling

data.quote: It's really hard to smile when you play. As a performer, if I ever find myself focusing, it's like, 'Oh no - orchestra face!' It's not attractive at all, so I have to focus on smiling.
data.author: Lindsey Stirling

data.quote: While journalists cannot right every wrong, champion every cause or fix every problem, they can - through the written word - lift someone's burden for a day, make some elderly woman on a bus smile or let them know they are noticed by someone.
data.author: Regina Brett

data.quote: Sometimes Queens' music is dark, but somehow it's ok to deliver it with a smile on your face because thing's are still going to kick in.
data.author: Josh Homme

data.quote: Riding Valegro always makes you smile, so I enjoy it.
data.author: Charlotte Dujardin

data.quote: I can't help but smile when I ride Valegro; I think something, and he does it. I laugh, and I think, 'God, how does he know? I didn't even ask. I just thought it.'
data.author: Charlotte Dujardin

data.quote: It is spectacular. From about five minutes in, when we knew for sure that we were going to have the weather to go, the smile on my face just got bigger and bigger, and I was just beaming through the whole launch. I mean, it is just an amazing ride.
data.author: Chris Hadfield

data.quote: My mother-in-law speaks not a word of English. I speak not a word of Tajiki. So I smile at her ingratiatingly and she fixes me with a beady eye.
data.author: Wilbur Smith

data.quote: 'Priced to sell' - just the phrase makes me smile. When a dealer says all the items in his booth are priced to sell, he means he's tagged them as aggressively as he can to get you to buy them. Don't worry, though, I still haggle. You have to. That's the point of a flea market.
data.author: Nate Berkus

data.quote: I was never one of those surly teenagers who doesn't smile. My lovely godfather said it was always lovely to see me because I was the only teenager who smiled. And I was so in awe of him, I thought it was one of the best things anyone had ever said to me. So it made me want to live up to what he said.
data.author: Olivia Colman

data.quote: In politics you learn to always smile.
data.author: Eliot Spitzer

data.quote: I've been successful in different areas, but nothing brings a smile to my face more than my oldest son, Zaire, and my second son, Zion, saying the kind word of 'Dad.'
data.author: Dwyane Wade

data.quote: Young women from a very young age are taught that life will be easier if you can just turn on the charming smile and say very little and be complacent and docile and sweet.
data.author: Amber Heard

data.quote: I love Jesus Christ with all my heart and everything He stands for. I think that sums up everything that I want for my life, everything I want for my family, everything I want for my career. I want it to be entertaining. I want people to smile and tap their toes, but I want it to be meaningful when the day is done.
data.author: Josh Turner

data.quote: I'm quite British in the sense of not expressing my emotions much. I save it for my songs. If you ask about a death in the family, or a lover, I will not be emotional. I'd probably answer with a smile. Because that's what we British blokes do.
data.author: James Blunt

data.quote: I have learned to smile when I wasn't happy, to sing when I didn't feel like it, and to do things just to please my fans.
data.author: Tionne Watkins

data.quote: People relate to me, and I try to make songs that make people smile.
data.author: Olly Murs

data.quote: When I hear theists and atheists pontificating on how they know God does or does not exist, I can only smile at the irrationality and, yes, vanity of the notion.
data.author: Vincent Bugliosi

data.quote: The Oscars are a lot different when you are a nominee. You walk around with this big smile on your face, and everyone, even people who work for rival film companies, tells you they voted for you.
data.author: Samuel Goldwyn

data.quote: A man can be drawn across the room with the simplicity of a smile. That's why your pearly whites should always be straight and shiny. I think most of my clients are drawn to a fun, flirty nature in a woman. The problem is, most women do not often feel fun and flirty.
data.author: Patti Stanger

data.quote: If I went to them all dressed up and flashed a nice smile for the cameras it would probably be easier for me to get work. But I just can't tolerate it.
data.author: Charlie Hunnam

data.quote: I'm always trying to make myself laugh. I'm the most enthusiastic audience I'm likely to find, so if it doesn't make me smile then it probably won't work on you. The jokes that only make me shrug get cut.
data.author: Victor LaValle

data.quote: You can always tell folks from nonfolks. Folks like to feel good, like to smile for the camera when there's a big photo opportunity for a really good cause.
data.author: Russell Baker

data.quote: I wish I was told to look after my teeth when I was younger. My smile is really important to me and one of my biggest assets, so I'm very conscious that I need to keep it in top condition.
data.author: Louise Nurding

data.quote: I'm a fun song maker. I love to make people smile. I also love to see them big, burly dudes crying because their wives' song is 'Die a Happy Man.'
data.author: Thomas Rhett

data.quote: I think one of my first jokes - in the black community, there's people who have jokes about skin tone. People like, 'You so black, you purple.' 'You so black, you gotta smile so we can see you at night.'
data.author: Hannibal Buress

data.quote: Crowds are the most difficult thing for me these days because I have to walk with my head down and my eyes averted. There's still that part of me that wants to hold my head up, make eye contact and smile.
data.author: Cameron Diaz

data.quote: I suffered from post-natal depression after Rowan was born. I had a healthy, beautiful baby girl and I couldn't look at her. I couldn't hold her, smile at her. All I wanted was to disappear and die.
data.author: Brooke Shields

data.quote: Country music in the mid-'90s was a big influence on my career, and I played all the songs that are referenced in '94' back in my club days. Joe Diffie was rocking a sick mullet, and he was hotter than ever... just putting out monster hit after monster hit. It totally takes me back to those days, and it makes me smile every time I hear it.
data.author: Jason Aldean

data.quote: When you have to work, work with a smile.
data.author: Kapil Dev

data.quote: I like to post positive content, and I like to try and make people smile. That's why those videos are popular. I don't fake it.
data.author: Cameron Dallas

data.quote: Ostensibly rigorous and realistic, contemporary conservatism is an ideology of denial. Its symbol is a smile button.
data.author: Christopher Lasch

data.quote: I bring people on stage with me. It's a good time, and people love to join in on the party. Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
data.author: Vanilla Ice

data.quote: After six years without seeing one, I love just seeing a smile - every smile I see gives me hope.
data.author: Ingrid Betancourt

data.quote: It's a blessing because the Baldwin vibe on the street is what I live for the most. I think our name is something that a lot of people get a good feeling about and brings a smile to their face, and we're very fortunate.
data.author: Stephen Baldwin

data.quote: Bob Dylan has always sealed his decisions with the unexplainable. His motives for withholding the release of the magnificent 'Basement Tapes' will be as forever obscure as Brian Wilson's reasons for the destruction of the tapes for 'Smile.'
data.author: Jon Landau

data.quote: I have always loved a hard-faced girl. I get that Alison Goldfrapp isn't easy, and I like her belligerence. She's deeply sexy and controlled, like a Strict Machine, and it seems to wind the b'jesus out of the women I know. On the outside, I watch and smile and will her on like a twisted silent maiden aunt in the dark corner.
data.author: Alison Moyet

data.quote: I had ordered long legs, but they never arrived. My eyes are weird too, one is gray and the other is green. I have a crooked smile and my nose looks like a ski slope. No, I would not win a Miss contest.
data.author: Jane Seymour

data.quote: I have had wrinkles on my forehead and my smile line since I was a kid. I see them in my own kids. I know what they're going to look like. So it's kind of like that's my personality. I feel the older you get, too, the more confident you become just in your own skin.
data.author: Faith Hill

data.quote: I just want to show the fans my big smile and play the game that I love.
data.author: Yani Tseng

data.quote: Anyone who's ever driven to Atlantic City knows that Trump's got a big billboard. For years, you used to see his angry face on it. I said, 'Trump, that expression is making people afraid to go to the Taj Mahal. Why don't you give them a big smile.? 'C'mon in, folks! Spend your money here!' I think we got that corrected.
data.author: Regis Philbin

data.quote: Red carpets seem so glamorous, but you're really just standing there sweating and worrying your hair is going to fall. And in the end, people are only going to see one picture of you. You just smile for one second and then you walk over to the side and check your phone. It's pretty weird.
data.author: Morgan Saylor

data.quote: Jessica Simpson is the youth ambassador for Operation Smile, and an episode of The Apprentice featured a team managing a charity concert she put on. Donald Trump came on stage and pledged a donation.
data.author: Roma Downey

data.quote: I think Operation Smile is in more than 22 countries, mostly Third World. It just happened that my schedule opened up at the time they were heading to Vietnam.
data.author: Roma Downey

data.quote: A smile costs about $240.
data.author: Roma Downey

data.quote: In Delhi, where I grew up, commerce is brusque. You don't ask each other how your day has been. You might not even smile. I'm not saying this is ideal - it's how it is. You're tied together by a transaction. The customer doesn't tremble before complaining about how cold his food is.
data.author: Karan Mahajan

data.quote: If I am not mistaken, it was a British poet who said that 'no one is properly dressed unless he wears a smile.'
data.author: Sukarno

data.quote: I've never liked my smile, you see. I should have had braces as a kid, but I was too proud and too vain. And I didn't want to be bullied at school.
data.author: Ricky Whittle

data.quote: I'm a huge sun baby. As soon as the sun comes out, my smile gets bigger, so I'm constantly smiling in L.A. It's a fantastic place to be.
data.author: Ricky Whittle

data.quote: People need to understand that the Lauryn Hill they were exposed to in the beginning was all that was allowed in that arena at the time. I had to step away for the sake of the machine. I was being way too compromised. I felt uncomfortable having to smile in someone's face when I really didn't like them or know them well enough to like.
data.author: Lauryn Hill

data.quote: It's very strange to go to cities like London and New York. People walk so quickly, they seem to be in a hurry all the time. And you don't say 'Hi' to everyone you meet, and you don't smile to everyone you meet, because there's just so many. Which is also very strange.
data.author: Aurora

data.quote: Genuine expressions of emotion rarely persist longer than five seconds and almost never longer than 10. A fixed smile is likely to conceal anger, anxiety, or some other negative emotion.
data.author: Pamela Meyer

data.quote: Watching movies in the U.S. is great fun because they get every joke, they smile, they laugh so much; it's a great feeling.
data.author: Jet Li

data.quote: I was so embarrassed about mispronouncing words. I just knew how to smile.
data.author: Adriana Lima

data.quote: He taught me never to smile, which helps me when I visit disaster sites.
data.author: Emo Philips

data.quote: And I like the look on people's faces when I say I'm doing this movie called Pride and Prejudice and they kind of smile, and then I say I'm in a movie called Doom and they kind of do a double take and try and put the two things together. And they never quite manage to.
data.author: Rosamund Pike

data.quote: Smile, it's better than a poke in the eye.
data.author: Douglas Horton

data.quote: 'Halal in the Family' will expose a broad audience to some of the realities of being Muslim in America. By using satire, we will encourage people to reconsider their assumptions about Muslims, while providing a balm to those experiencing anti-Muslim bias. I also hope those Uncles and Aunties out there will crack a smile!
data.author: Aasif Mandvi

data.quote: I'd much rather have sat there and just been a fly on the wall, instead of having to smile at people. I'd rather have been a waitress. Just gone round and stared at people.
data.author: Jennifer Saunders

data.quote: Many people say I smile more in Africa than in Sweden.
data.author: Henning Mankell

data.quote: If I buy a Fiat Uno, I'll read that, for a man like me, a Ferrari was more suitable. If instead I buy a Ferrari, they'll write that I should have kept my feet on the ground and bought a Fiat. If I smile, I'm not serious. If I don't smile, I'm a rich sulker that doesn't enjoy having the most beautiful job in the world.
data.author: Mario Balotelli

data.quote: I have my father's lopsided mouth. When I smile, my lips slope to one side. My doctor sister calls it my cerebral palsy mouth. I am very much a daddy's girl, and even though I would rather my smile wasn't crooked, there is something moving for me about having a mouth exactly like my father's.
data.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

data.quote: It is clear I was never the Pretty Girl. I had my two front teeth knocked out when I was 10 and didn't fix them until I was 19. I have a crooked smile and a nose that looks like it's been broken 12 times but never has been. My nose was always red, so people called me Rudolph. My whole face is off-center.
data.author: Ellen Barkin

data.quote: When it's your will versus another person's will, the worst thing you can do is smile in their face when you're competing. That's what I tell our guys. Go have fun.
data.author: DeAngelo Williams

data.quote: I'm one of those guys that - as far as relationships and stuff go - if you smile at me, I'm like, 'Let's date for three years' - which is just ridiculous.
data.author: Norman Reedus

data.quote: It brings a smile to my face every time I look in the record book and see my name with the likes of Hutson and Lance Alworth and Raymond Berry, some of the fabled receivers of the NFL. It's all like a dream to me. I can't believe it's true.
data.author: Steve Largent

data.quote: I know virtually no one of my age who can remember a hug, or a smile from their father, or a 'Let's go play football.'
data.author: Peter Mullan

data.quote: What I always think about when I think about 'Girls' is Lena being in a scene where she's very vulnerable, possibly directing, acting, and she's probably written the dialogue. It's 2 in the morning. Everyone's tired. Everyone's grumpy. And she has a smile on her face and kindness for everyone who interacts with her.
data.author: Jennifer Konner

data.quote: I'm a car fanatic and each morning I wake up with a smile on my face, whether I'm commentating on the Formula One or at Silver Hatch racetrack in Roary the Racing Car.
data.author: Murray Walker

data.quote: I kept hiding my smile in pictures throughout middle school and most of high school until picture day came my senior year.
data.author: Uzo Aduba

data.quote: When I was little, I didn't smile much. Don't get me wrong. I was a happy kid, but I couldn't stand the space, dead center, in between my teeth. Yeah, I could whistle through it, but so what? That didn't win me many points on the playground in Medfield, Massachusetts.
data.author: Uzo Aduba

data.quote: When you're watching somebody read your material and they smile and nod, you know you've found that place where your experience and their experience match, even though they aren't the same exact experience.
data.author: Chris Crutcher

data.quote: I just sing the stuff that makes me smile, makes me feel like I didn't sell myself out.
data.author: Patti LaBelle

data.quote: I think people take a liking to a voice or something that makes them smile and feel good about themselves.
data.author: Jess Glynne

data.quote: You have to tell guys to ask you on a date. Smile when you do it - however that works, I'm not 'Cosmo.' But yeah - not a lot of people know how to 'court' anymore, sorry.
data.author: Julie Klausner

data.quote: I'm happy to help Crest Whitestrips on their mission to inspire photographers everywhere to capture smile moments and would encourage aspiring photographers to express themselves through their photos.
data.author: Nigel Barker

data.quote: As soon as you 'Botox' your smile lines away, you lose part of your identity.
data.author: Nigel Barker

data.quote: Americans think Soviets are so grim. I want them to see that they can smile.
data.author: Yakov Smirnoff

data.quote: 'Unbreakable Smile' was based off one of the songs I wrote for the album - it was actually the first song I wrote for the album without realizing it yet. I think I wanted to name the album that because it seemed like that was just the theme of that chapter in my life and just the theme of all the songs put together.
data.author: Tori Kelly

data.quote: My grandmother, whom we call Biel, thinks it's very unbecoming of me not to smile for the paparazzi. So every time I see them, I think, 'Smile for Biel!'
data.author: Jessica Biel

data.quote: In the car on my way to premieres and awards shows, I'll sit with tissue paper under my armpits so I don't soil the delicate dress fabric. The whole time, I'm telling myself, 'Please don't sweat, please don't sweat.' I throw the tissues out right before I step out of the car, and nobody ever knows! I just put on a smile and fake it.
data.author: Jessica Biel

data.quote: For me, I think the Lord wanted me to win to put a smile on Chinese people's faces.
data.author: Michael Chang

data.quote: I want to put concepts in front of people that make them laugh or smile or even hate what I do. I'm not interested in just putting clothes in stores.
data.author: Thom Browne

data.quote: When checking in at an airport, no matter how rude the check-in person is to you, always smile and be nice because you don't know what kind of day they've had. You are going on holiday and they're stuck wherever they are. Be nice to them because they can re-route your baggage to wherever they feel like.
data.author: Ross Kemp

data.quote: I travel around the world, experiencing every language, every religion... some places where there's just no reason to smile, because their lives are so difficult.
data.author: Lionel Richie

data.quote: The same people who smile in my face would be the same ones to talk behind my back.
data.author: Timbaland

data.quote: I tend to look out for things with a resonance to my youth - artists or objects that seemed romantic all those years ago. I never buy anything purely for its value. I like possessions that smile back at me.
data.author: Nicholas Haslam

data.quote: The biggest thing we get out of it is seeing the kids smile. And hopefully we will also see that the lessons we're teaching - not only the fundamentals of hockey, but also the life values - are sinking in.
data.author: Bobby Orr

data.quote: I enjoy the process of composing music. The first time I hear a song, it has to bring a smile to my lips. You have to tap your feet and be able to sing the song.
data.author: Salman Khan

data.quote: The smile on your face lets me know that you need me, there's a truth in your heart that says you'll never leave me, and the touch of your hand says you'll catch me whenever I fall.
data.author: Alison Krauss

data.quote: I love a girl that can make me laugh. I am not really a laugh-at-things type of guy and I don't smile and laugh all the time... But if a girl can make me laugh... I'm in love!!!!
data.author: Jesse McCartney

data.quote: It's lovely to work with a group of actors who make you laugh and smile.
data.author: Kelly Reilly

data.quote: I was doing a Broadway musical called 'Smile' with Howard Ashman and Marvin Hamlisch in 1984/5 when it abruptly closed. Howard was in the middle of pre-production for 'The Little Mermaid,' so he kindly invited all the girls in our cast to audition for the film.
data.author: Jodi Benson

data.quote: The Viennese wash everything. Where else in the world does the government hire public servants to wash public telephone booths and the glass over traffic lights? Every time I see someone doing these things, I smile like a child.
data.author: Jonathan Carroll

data.quote: I love the Rio Grande Valley. I always say it's home - Texas is home. I've been out in L.A. a little over ten years, and I still get so excited when I go back home. It just feels comfortable; it makes me smile.
data.author: Cristela Alonzo

data.quote: I'm so glad cities have personalities, just like people have personalities. That's something that makes me smile.
data.author: Fred Armisen

data.quote: I get very nervous whenever I think about it. I've never done a serious play, and I have such awe of the woman - she's really my only idol. It's going to be a big stretch - certain people come out on stage and your face muscles automatically tense and you get ready to smile.
data.author: Judy Holliday

data.quote: But I am convinced that those Jews who stand aside today with a malicious smile and with their hands in their trousers' pockets will also want to dwell in our beautiful home.
data.author: Theodor Herzl
