data.quote: Bjorn was a different breed, I threw my best material at him, but he would never smile, but that added to the charm when he played me and Mac. We were going nuts and losing our mind and he was sitting back like he was on a Sunday stroll.
data.author: Jimmy Connors

data.quote: On street corners everywhere, people are looking at their cell phones, and it's easy to dismiss this as some sort of bad trend in human culture. But the truth is life is being lived there. When they smile - right, you've seen people stop - all of a sudden, life is being lived there, somewhere up in that weird, dense network.
data.author: Ze Frank

data.quote: I like girls that have a nice smile and nice eyes. I want to date a girl who understands my busy schedule and that I have to be on tour a lot. And she has to make me laugh!
data.author: Austin Mahone

data.quote: I was kind of like the Rhea Perlman of the bar. I was like Carla on 'Cheers.' People were more afraid of me. There was a point where I got a little surly. There were only so many chicken wings I could serve before losing the smile on my face.
data.author: Melissa Rauch

data.quote: I watched Gene Kelly for his smile, for his energy. Vittorio Gassman for his movement. Clark Gable for his mustache. And I watched Lassie who was happy as a dog.
data.author: Jean Dujardin

data.quote: Some people would rather have a lie that makes them smile than a truth that makes them cry. I'm the opposite I'd rather have people make me cry with the truth than try to make me smile.
data.author: Joyce Giraud

data.quote: Being in a rock band is about touring. It's about writing songs and it's about making records but it's also about taking a wonderful smile onto that stage and making the people feel good about themselves.
data.author: James Young

data.quote: We need prisons because there are some hardcore criminals, but I never met a guy who has been in jail that came out with a smile on his face thinking, 'Right, that's it - now I am going to be good!'
data.author: Tahar Rahim

data.quote: I think the divine is like a huge smile that breaks somewhere in the sea within you, and gradually comes up again.
data.author: John O'Donohue

data.quote: We're teaching our kids that attributes as vague and relatively meaningless as a toothy smile or a fine head of hair make a fine statement about a person.
data.author: Neil Cavuto

data.quote: We have such a long, familiar history with Peter Falk. The minute his mug is on that screen people smile.
data.author: Paul Reiser

data.quote: Women do come up to me, and they tell me what they think! I've gotten great compliments on my eyes and my smile. But I don't see myself as sexy.
data.author: Jesse L. Martin

data.quote: My mum is great for keeping hold of old classics - pieces of clothing that never age and never go out of fashion. She also says, 'Make sure you always smile - it makes everything look better!'
data.author: Amber Le Bon

data.quote: We tried to set up a company that patterned ourselves after Southwest in all the fun, the spirit, the great people, the smile, the efficiency side of it, but we've added some extras that people aren't used to finding on Southwest.
data.author: David Neeleman

data.quote: When I see these young girls who are dreaming the dream that I'm living, it's very very exciting and it puts a big smile on my face.
data.author: Sue Wicks

data.quote: I love Motown, that whole era. Marvin Gaye, Smokey Robinson. I just put on Pandora, and put it on Motown, and it makes me smile; makes me smile so much.
data.author: Tika Sumpter

data.quote: I think ultimately I make people happy: Whether I'm doing the stage show, giving somebody a makeover, or designing clothing, the end goal is to make people smile.
data.author: Carson Kressley

data.quote: People smile at me as if they know me. I just smile back. They probably might know me.
data.author: Jim Broadbent

data.quote: I don't want my writing to be work to read. My main goal is completely shameless entertainment. I want people to smile and giggle and enjoy the book. I'm not trying to save the world through literature.
data.author: Gail Carriger

data.quote: I can retire from football with a smile on my face.
data.author: John Matuszak

data.quote: We forget that this music, music made by my brothers and sisters, is still a baby. It's just beginning. When I think of the possibilities, it makes me smile.
data.author: Barry White

data.quote: When you see that many people with a smile on their face, then you must be doing something right.
data.author: Greg Norman

data.quote: A game one of my sisters will play with me in my first year of being alive is called Good Baby, Bad Baby. This consists of being told I am a good baby until I smile and laugh, then being told I am a bad baby until I burst into tears. This training will stand me in good stead all through my life.
data.author: Ali Smith

data.quote: I can sing and dance. I can smile - a lot.
data.author: Chris Colfer

data.quote: I smile so much at the theater my face hurts when I leave.
data.author: Heather Matarazzo

data.quote: Southerners smile more than other Americans.
data.author: John Shelton Reed

data.quote: In case you haven't heard, my girlfriends and I have declared the summer of 2012 as the best summer ever. The best way to document said 'best summer ever' is with a good ol' disposable camera. Smile, click, move on! Nobody gets pic approval, and there's no time wasted gathering around the camera to analyze a moment that just happened.
data.author: Candice Accola

data.quote: I have found that a smile and a stick will carry you through all right, and in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred it is the smile that does the trick.
data.author: Robert Powell

data.quote: I once called a guy into his own office and spun around in his own chair to greet him. That kind of thing may be why I quit, before I got into serious trouble. I would smile and the person would get so upset. But you do a thousand of those things, and it makes you weird.
data.author: Al Madrigal

data.quote: My father was short for a man, with a child's plaything for a name - Spinner. He had flawless dark brown skin and a head full of big, wet-looking curls, black as oil. And he had the smile of a scoundrel - the kind of smile that disarmed men and undressed women.
data.author: Charles M. Blow

data.quote: The person that's always talkin', you don't have to worry about that person. The person that while you're in his face, he's just lookin' at you with a smile on his face, that's the guy you worry about.
data.author: Michael Clarke Duncan

data.quote: The Parthenon without the marbles is like a smile with a tooth missing.
data.author: Neil Kinnock

data.quote: What do I like in a girl? I like a girl that likes me, a girl that knows how to smile and see the bright side of things. A girl that makes me a better person.
data.author: James Lafferty

data.quote: Both of our children are adopted, and my wife and I didn't go out of ways to find kids that looked like us. We were just happy to have some kids. And people tell me all the time that they look like us, and that's because they learn to smile and laugh and move their head a certain way from studying their parents' faces.
data.author: John Wells

data.quote: While you're improvising, you may come up with something which will break him up. As soon as that smile comes out, you know that, hey, we're having fun.
data.author: Shelley Berman

data.quote: I love a good laugh as well, I think that's so important in life, which is probably why I've dabbled in comedy writing as well as horror. I think if you can make someone laugh or smile it's the most special thing in the world.
data.author: Paul Kane

data.quote: When I was younger, I'd go to the Museum of Television and Radio in New York and watch this beautiful clip of Billie Holiday playing with a bassist, a pianist and Gerry Mulligan, who was a friend of mine, on baritone sax. At one point, she looks over at Gerry, and they just smile. When those moments happen, it's just lovely.
data.author: Patti Scialfa

data.quote: I don't really remember a time younger than 5 years old that I didn't have skates on because all I can remember is every day, tying up my skates and a big smile on my face, excited to go on the ice.
data.author: Michelle Kwan

data.quote: When trying to remember my share in the glow of the eternal present, in the smile of God, I return to my childhood, too, for that is where the most significant discoveries turn up.
data.author: Herman Hesse

data.quote: Oh, I talk about things; I drive my husband insane. And I can't tell a lie. Everyone knows. I do this smile thing.
data.author: Cecelia Ahern

data.quote: I come to work with a smile and I leave with a laugh, and I'm so grateful.
data.author: Robert Knepper

data.quote: I wasn't as used to the new dumb questions, so when men I had once thought of as wise daddies now asked me 'How do you write?' I did not try and spill red wine in their suede pants. I would just smile and say, 'On a typewriter in the mornings when there's nothing else to do.'
data.author: Eve Babitz

data.quote: I don't have to jump up and smile just because TV wants me to.
data.author: Walter Payton

data.quote: I love to see the smiles on people's faces when you cook for them. I love to go to different restaurants. I want to cook because I know this acting isn't going to last forever, and I want something to fall back on. It's another way to make people smile.
data.author: Raven-Symone

data.quote: People often expect me to be very serious, but it's not like my record company told me not to smile in photographs, because I was like that anyway.
data.author: Jose Gonzalez

data.quote: I've covered a lot of ground geographically and emotionally and for years I lost my connection with my family. But the best comfort you can have, whether you are on the phone or sitting there in the living room with them, is with your parents, and to me family has always meant protection. When you smile you get a smile back, unconditionally.
data.author: Brigitte Nielsen

data.quote: Jeff Kinney is tall and has a great smile, but don't be fooled, he's as slick as they come. A real player. And how he came up with a book that appeals to kids ages 8-13 baffles me. He's an unbelievably kind man with a great family.
data.author: Rachael Harris

data.quote: I have my own dance and production companies, and acting is my creative outlet. It's what I'm passionate about. I've actually created a lifestyle where I could act for free. I could get a job to pay the bills and act on the weekends to make me smile.
data.author: Brian J. White

data.quote: Very few things are totally devoid of any possibility of humor. If you are aware of that possibility and alive to the scene becoming that way, then it just happens naturally. That's what I feel living is like, too. I find a lot of things that make me smile or make me laugh over the course of the day.
data.author: Tom Drury

data.quote: In my whole career, I've never seen this type of race that you had to wait for the last day. There's so many teams that are involved. You've got to smile because we're in it.
data.author: David Wells

data.quote: I have a smile 24/7.
data.author: Candis Cayne

data.quote: My sculptures cause an uproar, astonishment, and put a smile on your face.
data.author: Florentijn Hofman

data.quote: Remember that it is not enough to abstain from lying by word of mouth; for the worst lies are often conveyed by a false look, smile, or act.
data.author: Abraham Cahan

data.quote: Anybody who knows me knows that I'm just here to put a smile on people's faces.
data.author: Jason Mitchell

data.quote: There is no point to samba if it doesn't make you smile.
data.author: Alma Guillermoprieto

data.quote: We never respect those who amuse us, however we may smile at their comic powers.
data.author: Marguerite Gardiner

data.quote: I do love to walk around in New York because people will notice me, smile, but they never bother anyone. New Yorkers are very cool. I love New York.
data.author: Creed Bratton

data.quote: I think the deafness affects me more than I realise; I think it makes me more tired. I loathe parties. I attend, smile and leave.
data.author: Stephanie Beacham

data.quote: Growing up, I was a huge fan of horror movies. There's nothing more fun than going into a movie with a smile because you know you're going to be scared to death. There's something thrilling about sitting there waiting for a scare to happen.
data.author: Ashley Bell

data.quote: All of the narration in 'Smile' is first-person. Most of the books that I grew up reading had first-person narrators for some reason. My diaries were written in this voice, and since this story is autobiographical, it just felt like a natural extension.
data.author: Raina Telgemeier

data.quote: I smile every time I hear that I'm a fan favorite or a teenage hottie. It is a nice compliment, and the remarks from the fans are great.
data.author: Sean Berdy

data.quote: I like guys with a nice smile. I know it's cliche, but it's so true! I like a guy with a nice smile and nice eyes.
data.author: Rebecca Black

data.quote: One of the most obvious parts of my character is the smile, and if I wasn't comfortable in myself then I wouldn't be able to smile so much.
data.author: Max Walker

data.quote: When most people think of Woodrow Wilson, they see a dour minister's son who never cracked a smile, where in fact he was a man of genuine joy and great sadness.
data.author: A. Scott Berg

data.quote: As long as I am still interested and curious, I enjoy getting up in the morning, but I can't say I have a happy smile on my face 24/7.
data.author: Harriet Walter

data.quote: My favorite books are the ones that make me smile for hours after reading them. I want that for my readers, for the sweetness to linger. Sort of like chocolate, but without the calories.
data.author: Sarah Addison Allen

data.quote: Football has to work really hard to put a smile on people's face and not to be so focused on the question of money. Everything is in danger of losing its soul if you're always going to sell out to the highest bidder.
data.author: Gordon Taylor

data.quote: Tanzanians are some of the friendliest you'll ever meet, insisting on a welcoming smile and wave as they pass you on the streets, exclaiming 'Jambo!'
data.author: Jodi Balfour

data.quote: I like outgoing girls with a lovely smile and beautiful eyes.
data.author: Corbin Bleu

data.quote: I hope there have been times when I made you all proud, or made you all smile or at least piqued your interest in this wonderful institution we call government.
data.author: John Rowland

data.quote: One study found that people who smile in childhood photographs are less likely to get a divorce.
data.author: Jenna McCarthy

data.quote: I collect all the reviews of the films I turned down. And when they're bad - I have to smile.
data.author: Simone Signoret

data.quote: I can't wait for summer in the city! I love all the free activities in the parks that become available to us New Yorkers. Yoga and movie screenings in Bryant Park, concerts in Central Park - there's so much more available to the New York community in the summer! And everyone just seems to smile more.
data.author: Kara Lindsay

data.quote: I enjoy what Twitter is because I can really connect with the fans and it's a great way to share information with them and it's also a great way to entertain. I like being able to put a smile on people's faces and letting them know what I'm doing.
data.author: Peter Facinelli

data.quote: If you're going to kill someone there isn't much reason to get all worked up about it and angry - you just pull the trigger. Angry discussions beforehand are a waste of time. We need to smile at Novell while we pull the trigger.
data.author: Jim Allchin

data.quote: I'm not looking for anything more than any other guy. I like a good smile. Pretty eyes. She has to be active, like not play-sports active, but she'll play air hockey, do some pool, go for rides on the Santa Monica Pier. I would much rather have fun with her than do the cool thing.
data.author: Mitchel Musso

data.quote: I'm the middle man. I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
data.author: Donald Dunn

data.quote: When you're surrounded by feathers and sequins and ridiculous Lycra outfits, it's impossible not to have a smile on your face.
data.author: Catherine Martin

data.quote: It's been a hard time to celebrate, to come out with a smile. But I'm an American. Naomi asked me to come out to support other Americans, and here I am.
data.author: Angie Everhart

data.quote: You see some of these actors, they have a permanent smile on their face. How can they do that? It really fascinates me.
data.author: Agnes Bruckner

data.quote: Indeed it is possible to stand with one foot on the inevitable 'banana peel' of life with both eyes peering into the Great Beyond, and still be happy, comfortable, and serene - if we will even so much as smile.
data.author: Douglas Fairbanks

data.quote: I don't smile much, and I never laugh. If you'd been through what I've been through, you wouldn't be smiling, either.
data.author: Charlie Sifford

data.quote: I love to see people laugh and put a smile on peoples' faces. Anytime I'm doing that I'm happy.
data.author: Dexter Darden

data.quote: I just smile. And they - my opponents don't like it when I smile at them. They think I'm playing or something. But - like I smile throughout the whole fight. Sometimes I'll be throwing combinations and I just smile and stick my tongue out at them.
data.author: Rau'Shee Warren

data.quote: Whenever I run into prejudice. I smile and feel sorry for them, and I say to myself, There's one more argument for birth control.
data.author: Freddy Fender

data.quote: I don't remember ever deciding to become a performer. I just always was. I began performing by mimicking the performers on the new television that first took the attention away from me as the baby of the household. I continued performing to put a smile on my grandmother's face and always considered her when accepting or declining roles.
data.author: T'Keyah Crystal Keymah

data.quote: When I first came to America, you know, I would look at the newsstands and see the women on the magazine covers. I had never seen anyone smile the way these girls smile! It's like they have nothing to worry about!
data.author: Anchee Min

data.quote: 'Try Again' - every time I hear that song, it just brings a smile to your face. When you're feeling like crap, and you hear, 'Dust yourself off and try again,' it kind of just puts you in a different mindset, 100 percent.
data.author: Alexandra Shipp

data.quote: When I draw my caricature self-portrait, I always do a huge smile.
data.author: Rolf Harris

data.quote: His smile is like the silver plate on a coffin.
data.author: John Philpot Curran

data.quote: If you meet a woman in a burqa, she can't reply to your smile. It's a denial of identity.
data.author: Jean-Francois Cope

data.quote: I was brought up by my father to think that the best thing in life was to be charming, to have a nice smile, always to be liked.
data.author: Miranda Seymour

data.quote: Seeing Michelle Obama's bright color choices, and how she made people smile and reinforced Obama's platforms of hope and change, was inspiring.
data.author: Lilly Pulitzer

data.quote: I figured out, I guess, that the job just makes me happy if it's not number one. So if it all works, great. If it doesn't, I still go home, look at my kids, and I have a big smile on my face.
data.author: Thomas Kretschmann

data.quote: They gave each other a smile with a future in it.
data.author: Ring Lardner

data.quote: I am a joyful conservative, unafraid to articulate big ideas with an optimistic smile.
data.author: Kevin Cramer

data.quote: As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
data.author: Samuel Pepys

data.quote: Ever since I was 2 or 3, I loved to perform for people. I would walk up to another table in a restaurant and crack a joke, sing a song, do a dance, or something entertaining, and the 'audience' would almost always smile and laugh.
data.author: Maxim Knight

data.quote: Whenever I look at a baby or children in general, I smile and just want to play with them.
data.author: Odeya Rush

data.quote: I play guys who never smile, and I never stop smiling.
data.author: Michael Joseph Kelly

data.quote: My mom's one of the toughest ladies I know. I've seen her lose both her brothers, both her parents. She's been through a lot, and to see her get up every day and put a smile on her face, that shows nothing but strength.
data.author: DeMar DeRozan

data.quote: No one is so completely disenchanted with the world, or knows it so thoroughly, or is so utterly disgusted with it, that when it begins to smile upon him he does not become partially reconciled to it.
data.author: Giacomo Leopardi

data.quote: I sat in at every club in New York City, jamming with musicians, because it felt right - and because it felt right and we were having fun - the people dancing and sipping their drinks in the clubs felt it too and it made them smile.
data.author: Ray Conniff

data.quote: When life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
data.author: Andrea Thompson

data.quote: And History will smile to think that this is the species for which Socrates and Jesus Christ died.
data.author: Julien Benda

data.quote: I try to make people smile and dance, not think about things or educate them.
data.author: Norman Cook

data.quote: The essence of life is the smile of round female bottoms, under the shadow of cosmic boredom.
data.author: Guy de Maupassant

data.quote: The weaker the country, the stronger the smile.
data.author: Howard E. Koch

data.quote: From a very young age, music was very much in my house. I would sit with my mom, with the old LPs, listening to The Beatles and Carly Simon and Lionel Richie. The old LPs used to have the lyrics. From there, I would put on dance and music displays for my family, just to entertain them and make people laugh and smile.
data.author: Lara Pulver

data.quote: When I used to wrestle professionally, I preferred being the bad guy known as 'The Heel;' you would get to 'work the crowd,' getting them to hate you and want to see you lose, while the good guy 'Babyface' would walk in, smile and shake hands with a few kids, and his acting job was done.
data.author: Conan Stevens

data.quote: I spend days on my Xperia logging on Facebook chatting with my friends and family at home; I love listening to Rihanna and Pink and watching movies. Basically, anything that makes me smile, but most of my fans will know that I am always smiling!
data.author: Dominika Cibulkova

data.quote: My eyes are different sizes, my nose is too broad at the bridge and squishes up when I laugh, and my lips are sorta funny when I smile.
data.author: Terry Farrell

data.quote: I love to smile.
data.author: Inge de Bruijn

data.quote: Arnold Palmer has what I call an 'Eisenhower smile'. Those two men, they'd smile and their whole faces would look so pleasant; it was like they were smiling all over.
data.author: Byron Nelson

data.quote: When my time ends, I want people to say, 'Man her music made me smile; it just enlightened my life; it inspired me; it made me feel good every time.'
data.author: Ledisi

data.quote: I don't hear a lot about elected officials that are men talking about whether they smile a lot. My dad was in elected office my entire life. I don't remember many smiles, and nobody commented about it. He was serious about his job, and so am I.
data.author: Stephanie Rawlings-Blake

data.quote: After God and my family, it's surf. I don't imagine me not surfing. Surf brings me smile every day.
data.author: Gabriel Medina

data.quote: I grew up in a household without a TV. We lived next door to a library for a while, and at one point, I checked out all the books in the fairy tale section. I remember the librarian's quiet smile as I'd bring back one stack and exchange it for another.
data.author: Victoria Hanley

data.quote: Tell me not of joy: there's none Now my little sparrow's gone; He, just as you, Would toy and woo, He would chirp and flatter me, He would hang the wing awhile, Till at length he saw me smile, Lord! how sullen he would be!
data.author: William Cartwright

data.quote: You keep shooting. You hope it goes in, and you smile.
data.author: Teemu Selanne

data.quote: We're under some gross misconception that we're a good species, going somewhere important, and that at the last minute we'll correct our errors and God will smile on us. It's delusion.
data.author: Farley Mowat

data.quote: Someone asked me the other day what it feels like to see all my 'old stuff' reappearing, at long last, in digital. And I had to smile because to me it doesn't feel like 'old stuff.'
data.author: Barbara Hambly

data.quote: Oh, the ignorance of us upon whom Providence did not sufficiently smile to permit us to be born in New England.
data.author: Horace Porter

data.quote: In masks outrageous and austere, The years go by in single file; But none has merited my fear, And none has quite escaped my smile.
data.author: Elinor Wylie

data.quote: When you consider all the stars I have managed, mere submarines make me smile.
data.author: Charles Frohman

data.quote: When Fortune smiles, I smile to think how quickly she will frown.
data.author: Robert Southwell

data.quote: Action is drama. If we cannot make the audience laugh, smile or cry with us, we are not actors.
data.author: Sonny Chiba

data.quote: I really get a smile that people think they have a right to even suggest how I give my money away. I have no mandate to give a dime to anybody.
data.author: Peter B. Lewis

data.quote: I always challenge myself. I get out in deep water and I always try to get back. But I get hung up. The audience never knows, but that's when I smile the most, when I show the most ivory.
data.author: Earl Hines

data.quote: I will know how to hold you just by the look in your eye, I will never forget - not even on the day that I die. This is a promise of my passion for you, smile at me and make it true.
data.author: Diana Lynn

data.quote: We think of stars as celestial beings. And once in a while, they smile at us from the pages of 'People' magazine.
data.author: A. E. Hotchner

data.quote: In junior high school, I was an object of pure ridicule for my dress, withdrawal, and asocial manner. Dozens of times, I saw individuals laugh and smile more in ten to fifteen minutes than I did in all my life up to then.
data.author: Arthur Bremer

data.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
data.author: Minna Antrim

data.quote: A tramp, a gentleman, a poet, a dreamer, a lonely fellow, always hopeful of romance and adventure.
data.author: Charlie Chaplin

data.quote: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise.
data.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

data.quote: Kiss me and you will see how important I am.
data.author: Sylvia Plath

data.quote: There's something about the sound of a train that's very romantic and nostalgic and hopeful.
data.author: Paul Simon

data.quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
data.author: Luciano De Crescenzo

data.quote: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter.
data.author: John Keats

data.quote: Tradition wears a snowy beard, romance is always young.
data.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

data.quote: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
data.author: James Russell Lowell

data.quote: Bid me to love, and I will give a loving heart to thee.
data.author: Robert Herrick

data.quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart.
data.author: Lord Byron

data.quote: All the windows of my heart I open to the day.
data.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

data.quote: When I walk with you I feel as if I had a flower in my buttonhole.
data.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

data.quote: How far away the stars seem, and how far is our first kiss, and ah, how old my heart.
data.author: William Butler Yeats

data.quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists... When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.
data.author: Edmond de Goncourt

data.quote: A man's kiss is his signature.
data.author: Mae West

data.quote: A realist, in Venice, would become a romantic by mere faithfulness to what he saw before him.
data.author: Arthur Symons

data.quote: I have often been downcast but never in despair; I regard our hiding as a dangerous adventure, romantic and interesting at the same time. In my diary, I treat all the privations as amusing.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm.
data.author: Mason Cooley

data.quote: When I give I give myself.
data.author: Walt Whitman

data.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic and I believe that you can find love in many different places and be very conflicted. I've discovered as I've grown up that life is far more complicated than you think it is when you're a kid. It isn't just a straightforward fairytale.
data.author: Rachel McAdams

data.quote: My heart is like a singing bird.
data.author: Christina Rossetti

data.quote: All I ever wanted was to be a sexy bride, and actually, I think I've turned into a romantic bride.
data.author: Poppy Delevingne

data.quote: Romantic love is an addiction.
data.author: Helen Fisher

data.quote: Be brave, young lovers, and follow your star.
data.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

data.quote: Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, Laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass.
data.author: Rupert Brooke

data.quote: My personal decorating style is cozy, romantic and a little rustic, with a sense of whimsy.
data.author: Kimberly Schlapman

data.quote: You feel very romantic when you're in a ball gown. Everyone should wear one once in a while.
data.author: Carolina Herrera

data.quote: When I was a kid, I knew the black and white version of 'Jane Eyre,' and I guess I became interested in the idea of romantic love - of unrequited love and the tragedies of that; of what are the important things in life; what should one value over other materials.
data.author: Cary Fukunaga

data.quote: The most impactful place that I've been to where I was just completely awestruck, happy, moved is Victoria Falls between Zambia and Zimbabwe. It is probably the most beautiful and romantic place in the world.
data.author: Hill Harper

data.quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all.
data.author: Samuel Butler

data.quote: I am a hopeless romantic. And I won't stop till I get it right.
data.author: Halle Berry

data.quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.
data.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

data.quote: I'm into all that sappy stuff - a surprise picnic, nice dinner, or traveling. I'm kind of an old romantic.
data.author: Will Estes

data.quote: Grunge is a hippied romantic version of punk.
data.author: Marc Jacobs

data.quote: I'm a very loyal boyfriend. I'm a bit of a joker... I can be romantic, but not too sickly.
data.author: Louis Tomlinson

data.quote: I love the ukulele. It's got a beautiful, melodic tone to it. There's something innocent and romantic, and it's just a grand instrument to play.
data.author: Pierce Brosnan

data.quote: I joined the air force. I took to it immediately when I arrived there. I did three years, eight months, and ten days in all, but it took me a year and a half to get disabused of my romantic notions about it.
data.author: Morgan Freeman

data.quote: I'm not religious, I'm not romantic and I live purely by logic. I make every decision by logic and sometimes that leads me to the right and sometimes to the wrong decision.
data.author: Laura Marling
